articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: Oil giant Shell beats first-quarter profit estimates, launches $3.5 billion share buyback - CNBC
articles.description: British oil giant Shell on Thursday reported stronger-than-expected first-quarter profit, boosted by higher refining margins and robust oil trading.
articles.content:
British oil giant Shell on Thursday reported stronger-than-expected first-quarter profit, boosted by higher refining margins and robust oil trading.
Shell reported adjusted earnings of $7.7 billion … [+1315 chars]
